articles.title: Google, Apple, Meta, Amazon, Twitter: New report reveals who collects the most data from users - Firstpost
articles.description: A recent study shows that of all the big tech companies, Google collects the most data from users, beating out Meta, Twitter and Amazon, whereas Apple collects the least.
articles.content:
